column5: As a new sponsor of OFC, we cordially invite one and all to join our ever growing club of avid outdoor enthusiasts. GREAT CANADIAN SPORTSMAN is Canada's premiere FREE TO READER online magazine featuring hunting and fishing adventures across the country. Members also get our online CANADIAN DEER HUNTING  magazine - thats two for FREE. To become a member, visit us at http://www.greatcanadiansportsman.com   - registration is free and its easy. hope you join us! thanx
